QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_z_test_3c.id odf_pk, odf_ca_z_test_3c.code as code, odf_ca_z_test_3c.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_z_test_3c.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, (NVL((SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 from NMC_CONVERSATIONS TC WHERE TC.RESOURCE_NAME='z_test_3c' AND TC.RESOURCE_ID = odf_ca_z_test_3c.id)), 0)) as has_conversations, 'z_test_3c' as odf_obj_type, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_z_test_3c.created_by) as created_by, odf_ca_z_test_3c.ODF_BLUEPRINT_ID as odf_blueprint_id, odf_ca_z_test_3c.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, ( SELECT P.PAGE_CODE FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = ODF_CA_Z_TEST_3C.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'z_test_3c' ) ) as page_layout, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_z_test_3c.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_z_test_3c.name as name, NVL( odf_ca_z_test_3c.odf_blueprint_id, (select id from odf_blueprints b where b.type = NLS_UPPER('z_test_3c') and b.is_default = 1 ) ) as odf_blp_active_id, odf_ca_z_test_3c.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_z_test_3c.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_z_test_3c.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_z_test_3c.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code, odf_ca_z_test_3c.z_text_attribute as z_text_attribute from odf_ca_z_test_3c odf_ca_z_test_3c where 1 = 1
